scripts.e2e:dev: yarn kill-amplify-mock-api && (amplify mock api &) && wait-on http-get://localhost:20002 && kill-port 3000 && (yarn dev &) && wait-on http-get://localhost:3000 && PORT=3000 cypress open --env PORT=3000
scripts.e2e: yarn kill-amplify-mock-api && (amplify mock api &) && wait-on http-get://localhost:20002 && kill-port 5000 && yarn build && (npx serve build/ &) && wait-on http-get://localhost:5000 && cypress open --env PORT=5000
scripts.e2e:ci: yarn kill-amplify-mock-api && (amplify mock api &) && wait-on http-get://localhost:20002 && kill-port 5000 && yarn build && (npx serve build/ &) && wait-on http-get://localhost:5000 && PORT=5000 cypress run --env PORT=5000
